it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.graph

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.graph.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Node implements a generic node in a entity-graph, represented as its node-id, plus a set of incoming or outcoming nodes (the neighbours, represented as an array of integers)
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli, diego.ceccarelli@isti.cnr.it created on 05/lug/2012
